name: subgraph-repo-example
description: An example repo to get you started with Subgraphs. Based on the example [Hedera Smart Contracts Repo](https://github.com/Daniel-K-Ivanov/hedera-contracts-repo-example)

scripts.compile: npx mustache config/testnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy-local: npx @graphprotocol/graph-cli deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ -l v0.0.1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 Greeter
scripts.graph-local-clean: docker compose down -v && docker-compose rm -v && rm -rf data/ipfs data/postgres
